channel.title: Chris Moran
channel.description:
Hello all, remember [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,477106.0.html]this thread[/url]? Well, he scammed me with his Moderator status today on another website. $70 worth of goods gone.
[url=http://rsportal.org/scammers/23249-scammed-pepsi-man.html]http://rsportal.org/scammers/23249-scammed-pepsi-man.html[/url]
So I stalked him a little and found out a few things about him. If you guys, especially shrogg, want to get back at him, call him out [url=http://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100000699707312]here[/url]. I know it may be insensitive and not very nice, but a leopard never changes its spots, do a quick google search on his "chris@pepsiman.info" and you'll find that he has scammed many a people, and still shows much defiance and arrogance over his immoral acts.
Embarass the shit out of that guy please. And lol, he was even [url=http://www.4042.com/4042forums/showthread.php?t=31510]arrested for fighting over an iPod[/url]. What a douche.

item.title: Chris Moran
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

I understand that this kid repeatedly steals from you but the rule of thumb here is: fool me once, shame on you, fool me twice, shame on me.

Obviously though we don’t approve of what he’s done to you but we also don’t approve of you posting his personal information on this web site.

Read full topic

item.title: Chris Moran
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

just play WoW

Read full topic

item.title: Chris Moran
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

oooh, mod on a server. aren’t you powerful
I’m the server will be down in about 2 days.
They mean nothing. You’re loss.

Read full topic

item.title: Chris Moran
item.dc:creator: @caiyixian caiyixian
item.description:
@caiyixian wrote:

Alright then, I’ll remove the memorial link.

Read full topic

item.title: Chris Moran
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

Idiocy is your fault.
Don’t take it out on a group for someone who has died because of it.

Read full topic

item.title: Chris Moran

item.description:

Won’t make a difference

item.title: Chris Moran
item.dc:creator: @caiyixian caiyixian
item.description:
@caiyixian wrote:

noobs are ftw:

Like we care? There’s plenty of assholes out there so man up and get used to the real world

Taking out another asshole in this world would be a good thing, don’t cha think?

Read full topic
